MetaData.MetaDataItem:
Schlage The Schlage Home Dimmer Module puts smart home lighting control in your hands, from anywhere. All you need is Nexia™ Home Intelligence and most any web-connected computer, tablet or smart phone. It lets you do so much more than turn on a light.
· Set Nexia to automatically trigger “lights on” with a Schlage Home Keypad Lock when you enter your code at the door. · Reduce energy use and save money by turning lights off after you leave the house. · Control table and floor lamps remotely through your Nexia subscription. · Brighten or dim a room on your way home to prepare a comfortable setting. · The Home Dimmer Module expands the reach of Nexia in your home by extending its range up to 200 additional feet so you can add more Nexia devices. · The Home Dimmer Module provides one Nexia AC outlet and one standard AC outlet so you’re not sacrificing any outlet space.
Remote management with a Nexia™ Home Intelligence system requires the Nexia Bridge and a monthly subscription of $8.99.

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/672/xml

Value.label: Load Sensing
Value.Help: Turn on the module when the attached load is connected

Value.label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
Value.Help: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

Value.label: On/Off Command Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Value.label: Local Control Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: Local Control Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Value.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
Value.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Value.label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
Value.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
